channel.title: mobile on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in mobile on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-02
item.description: Google announces grab bag of new Android features for the end of 2021 (3 minute read) Google has announced several updates coming to Android that include new widgets for some Google apps, new Android Auto features, and updates for Google Assistant and Google Photos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-11
item.description: Apple launches Apple Business Essentials: Device management, storage, onsite repairs, and more for one monthly price (2 minute read) Apple Business Essentials is a new offering from Apple that combines device management, 24/7 phone support for IT and end-users, business iCloud support, and an option for onsite repairs for some businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-16
item.description: Barack Obama, Joe Biden, Elon Musk, Apple, and others hacked in unprecedented Twitter attack (7 minute read) Twitter accounts of some major companies and individuals were compromised in an attack that resulted in Twitter blocking new tweets from all verified users and locking all compromised accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-03
item.description: LG set to release ‘rollable’ phone next year (4 minute read) LG Electronics will launch a ‘rollable’ smartphone in early 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-02
item.description: Google discontinues the Pixel 3A and 3A XL (2 minute read) Google has discontinued the Pixel 3A and 3A XL smartphones.
